com.localytics.android

Class PlacesCampaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localytics.android.Campaign
      • com.localytics.android.PlacesCampaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class PlacesCampaign
extends Campaign
    The places campaign class from which user can get the places campaign information. A places campaign object is passed to the user through MessagingListenerV2.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable
